tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE QuantumStates (
    state_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantum_state JSONB,
    evolution_step INTEGER,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE StateEvolution ( 
 state_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 task_id UUID REFERENCES Task(task_id), 
 state_description STRING, 
 initial_state DECIMAL, 
 final_state DECIMAL 
);
